itemDescription: Scotch-Irish-Canadian-American businessman; cousin to Alexander Graham Bell

wikipedia_page.main: Charles James Bell (April 12, 1858 – October 2, 1929) was an Irish-born Canadian and American businessman, first cousin of Alexander Graham Bell, son-in-law of Gardiner Greene Hubbard, nephew of Alexander Melville Bell. He was a co-founder of the National Geographic Society.
